order by volunteer_id desc

insert into edu_my_voluneer(user_id, volunteer_id, regist_date) values (#{userId}, #{volunteerId}, #{registDate})
mapper.select: SELECT v.volunteer_id AS volunteerId, v.user_id AS userId, v.title, v.image, v.place, v.number, v.flowers, v.content, v.visits, v.release_date AS releaseDate, v.activity_date AS activityDate FROM edu_my_voluneer m LEFT JOIN edu_volunteer v on m.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id where m.user_id = #{userId}
